channel.title: The Film Reroll
channel.description: Playing through your favorite movies like RPG’s and totally ruining them
channel.itunes:summary:
We take famous movies and play through them as if they were a role playing game. Instead of all those pesky writers carefully crafting a plot, we let the dice decide and go from there. Inevitably it all goes completely off the rails.

With Paulo Quiros, Jocelyn Vammer, Jon Miller and Pitr Strait.
channel.itunes:author: Reroll Radio
channel.itunes:subtitle: Playing through your favorite movies like RPG's and totally ruining them

item.title: Ep 46: Friday the 13th: the Final Chapter (Part 1)
item.description: We play through the fourth Friday the 13th movie, but I didn’t tell the players they were in a Friday the 13th movie. Insert evil laugh here. Pitr Strait – Jimmy Joz Vammer – Sara Carolyn Faye Kramer – Samantha Andy Hoover – Paul Paulo Quiros – DM
item.content:encoded:
We play through the fourth Friday the 13th movie, but I didn’t tell the players they were in a Friday the 13th movie. Insert evil laugh here.

Pitr Strait – Jimmy

Joz Vammer – Sara

Carolyn Faye Kramer – Samantha

Andy Hoover – Paul

Paulo Quiros – DM

item.title: Ep 31: Bill and Ted’s Excellent Adventure (Part 2)
item.description: Bill and Ted’s Excellent Adventure is still totally going, dude! It’s totally amazing! And also kinda bogus at times. But mostly amazing! Jocelyn Vammer – Bill S. Preston Esq. Scott Aiello – Ted “Theodore” Logan Paulo Quiros – DM
item.content:encoded:
Bill and Ted’s Excellent Adventure is still totally going, dude! It’s totally amazing! And also kinda bogus at times. But mostly amazing!

Jocelyn Vammer – Bill S. Preston Esq.

Scott Aiello – Ted “Theodore” Logan

Paulo Quiros – DM

item.title: Ep 23: O Brother, Where Art Thou?
item.description: We play O Brother, Where Art Thou! Andy is in a tight spot! Joz eats some blueberries! Paulo punches a dog! Andy Hoover – Ulysses Everett McGill Paulo Quiros – Pete Hogwallop Jocelyn Vammer – Delmar O’Donnell Jon Miller – DM
item.content:encoded:
We play O Brother, Where Art Thou! Andy is in a tight spot! Joz eats some blueberries! Paulo punches a dog!
